description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Maple & Quinoa Chicken Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Sticky Maple & Quinoa Chicken Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove skin from drumsticks and discard. Mix vinegar, maple syrup, sauces, oil and garlic in a large non-reactive bowl. Add drumsticks and toss to coat. Marinate for 4-6 hours or overnight.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper. Place drumsticks and marinade in pan and bake for 40 minutes, turning halfway, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat frying pan over medium heat. Add quinoa and sesame seeds and toast, stirring, for 3-4 minutes or until toasted and golden.
Scatter quinoa mix over drumsticks and serve with lettuce, cucumber and relish.
Serve with tomato, date & apple relish.
